name: Synthwave Racers
description:
A futuristic, Sci-Fi, yet somehow nostalgic racing experience designed for enjoyers of both casual and intense racing games alike, Synthwave RacersⓇ is centered around the thrill of driving fast and precise through beautiful retro-inspired environments while jamming to 80's inspired synthwave music tracks.



Features:

  • 40 custom built linear campaign levels with increasingly innovative designs, interactions, and features
  • Full customization system with intriguing bikes, karts, characters, wheels, colors, and more
  • 5-player online multiplayer with friends or clients around the world, using dedicated servers for most optimal performance
  • AI racers for both local multiplayer, and online multiplayer, autofilling spots in servers that require them
  • Custom gravitational-based physics system allowing for ridiculous tracks, including loop-de-loops, gravity switching, and more
  • Time trials with record keeping system for both fastest lap and full course times
  • KBM & Xbox Controller support (controller reccomended)
  • Custom services module records gameplay stats, record stats, and more via the Corrtex AccountⓇ system
  • Over 14 meticulously crafted, retro-synthwave tracks designed specifically to race at hypersonic speeds to
  • 5 precisely designed multiplayer courses with unique theming, soundtracks, and layouts
  • In-game loot system where simply completing courses, campaign levels, and leveling up, rewards you with loot tokens to unlock new customization items for free

In-progress Features:
  • Local 4 player Co-Op
  • In-game level editor + level sharing/streaming system
  • Second wave of multiplayer courses and items
  • Corrtex AccountⓇ system improvements allowing for parties, cross-platform play, downloadable time trials racers, and global leaderboards
  • Steamworks SDK integration for achievements
